button.download_document: Download the presentation about the studio

about.description_studio:
AdService is one of the largest computer graphics, duplication and post-production studios. The permanent staff numbers over 70 people and the offices are located in Dubai and Moscow. The studio was founded in 2012. 
We implement more than 500 projects a year, hold leading positions on the market, and provide services to the largest international and local companies.
about.text1:
production of integrated 3D graphics,
design of characters and animation,
motion graphics,
production of static KV
about.text2:
preparation of videos to fit different formats, preparation of resizes,
 production of animatics
about.text3:
video editing, sound design, 
color correction, any kind of rights buyout

team.description: Adservice constantly searches for new talents. We are  looking for computer graphics artists, art directors, editors, illustrators and producers.
